mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Alamo, general view
Mission San Antonio de Valero
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Mission established 1718; construction on present complex begun 1724. Mission secularized 1793. Military use begun 1803, Siege and Battle of the Alamo took place February-March, 1836. Ownership of the chapel by the Catholic Church affirmed 1855; military use of the complex continued until 1876. Chapel sold to the State of Texas 1883. Various restoration efforts carried out, 20th-21st centuries. [work]
